_sText: Map file has been updated to surf_ny_bigloop_2008a, there was a teleporter problem. Make sure to get the newer bsp! ______________________________________ Bigloop 2008 ______________________________________ Remade from scratch by Paper-Cut, with permission from FAJ. FAJ oversaw every aspect of this remake, from the texturing to making sure the gameplay of the original stayed as perfect as it was in v6 of the original. ______________________________________ This map is all about ramp combat, so if you like skill maps because you have to have "talent", then go home. Get ready for speed, blood, and a face full of shotgun shells. Grab yourself an M3 and jump into the madness. ______________________________________ Map designed for 66tick, will work fine on 100tick. ______________________________________ Thanks goes out to: FAJ, for letting me remake the map Etrigan, for ideas and testing SintaxError, for helping me with various things along the way. Turkey Eater, for the text idea. _______________________________________ Visit Solidsurf.info for more great surf maps and surf mapping tutorials.
